name: Koninklijke Horeca Nederland
membership:
Hotrec (European level)
VNO/NCW and MKB-Nederland in The Netherlands
goal: Representing the interests of the members of Koninklijke Horeca Nederland. An association for hospitality businesses in The Netherlands. We represent our members on local, national and European level.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Food Safety, Public Health, Single market, Taxation

Directive on Work-Life-Balance

platform to business regulation
